name: Brottas Land 2
description:
Released after the critically acclaimed Brottas Underground but taking place several decades beforehand, Brottas Land 2 follows the continued adventures of Fatso Brotta as he once again steps up to take out the horrible bug menace plaguing his land, but this time, there's more than just a simple insect infestation to worry about. Something else is afoot in the land of the Old Maidist Homeworld!

Also, the economy has gotten way WAY better?? There's money everywhere! It's pretty great.

Brottas Land 2 improves substantially on all aspects of the original game's design. Featuring updated graphics with more than 4 colours, as well as an updated game engine (it saves!!!), more levels with more varied level design and gimmicks, as well as a full story complete with cutscenes similar to those used in the critically acclaimed Brottas Underground, Brottas Land 2 is sure to please.

The game also contains twice as many secrets as the original! Lucky you! Find them all and you might just get something special! ;A

Something to note: The game auto-saves on every map screen, and no sooner!! So if you get halfway through a world and decide to stop, just remember that you'll have to start that whole world over again, even if you're near the end!
